definitions.definition: A combat engineer ; an engineer or a soldier engaged in attacking, destroying, and circumventing or building fortifications , bridges, and roads; a military engineer active in a combat zone.
An officer or private of the Royal Engineers .

main_definition: A combat engineer ; an engineer or a soldier engaged in attacking, destroying, and circumventing or building fortifications , bridges, and roads; a military engineer active in a combat zone.
secondary_definitions: ( British , colloquial ) An officer or private of the Royal Engineers .
